ai.summary: Heritage Trail is a short, easy 2.5 km hike in the UK, ideal for beginners and families, with gentle paths and light scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: The route follows well-maintained footpaths with occasional grass sections, light gravel, and very minimal elevation gain, making it accessible to most walkers.
ai.safety_notes: Always wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing; stay on marked paths and follow trail signs; bring water and a small snack; check daylight hours; hike with a companion when possible; be mindful of other walkers and vulnerable wildlife; carry a basic first aid kit for minor injuries.
recommended_gear: Map or offline GPS / fully charged phone
Small first aid kit (blister care, plasters)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn; winter can be cold, wet and muddy, so plan accordingly.

seo.title: Heritage Trail — Easy 2.5 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Experience a gentle 2.5 km hike on the Heritage Trail in the UK. Easy, family-friendly terrain with light scenery—perfect for a short outdoor outing.
seo.h1: Heritage Trail – Easy 2.5 km Hike in the UK
